akas from release info: Tiny House - Piccole case per vivere in grande Italy

1.title: Petit Chateau in Paris
1.plot: Brooklynite Shari has always dreamed of having her very own "little chateau" in Paris. It's a family affair as her aunt Adrian and cousin Erica join her on her tiny house hunt through the City of Light. Shari's looking for a place with plenty of light, in a great location and with some Parisian charm but with her modest budget she may be looking in the wrong city.

2.title: Escaping Brisbane
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: A Tiny Starter Home in Devon
3.plot: Anxious to leave the nest, Esther has decided to become a tiny house investor to help fund her dream of becoming a world traveler. With the help of her mom, she wants to find the perfect rental property and homebase in the moors of Devon.

4.title: Small and Sustainable in Kin Kin
4.plot: Alanna and Zeb hope to leave big-city Brisbane and move two-hours away to small-town Kin Kin, Australia. They're on the hunt for a simpler, stress-free life, and a tiny home with land so they can raise livestock and live sustainably.

5.title: Escaping Mom and Dad by Going Tiny
5.plot: Young couple Chad and Katherine are currently living with Katherine's parents and are ready for a space of their own. With house prices booming and an extremely tight budget, they've decided to go tiny.

6.title: Going Mini and Metropolitan in Dublin
6.plot: After spending years in bustling London and New York, Tom and Sasha eventually had kids and settled in the countryside of her native Ireland. Nine years later, the couple is craving the sights and sounds of the city.

7.title: Going Tiny in the Venice of the North
7.plot: After spending years in an oversized bachelor pad, Matthew is excited to purchase his first property in Amsterdam. With the help of his boyfriend Vincent, Matthew is eager to find a space they both love. But with a large wish list and a modest budget, will Matthew be able to find a space to call home for him and Vincent?

8.title: Escaping Melbourne's Madness by Going Tiny
8.plot: Free spirits Alyce and Paul hope to leave the hustle and bustle of Melbourne and achieve a life with more freedom by going tiny. Paul wants an oceanside house on wheels, but Alyce isn't sure if she's ready for the open road. Will these two creative souls be able to find a middle ground or will one of them have to compromise on the tiny house of their dreams?

9.title: Modern Bachelor Pad in Lisbon
9.plot: Filipe is tired of wasting his money on rent and is ready to purchase his first property in Lisbon. With a tiny budget, and a large wish list, this architect pays attention to the details and wants a perfectly designed, move in ready space.

10.title: Going Tiny and Off the Grid
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Living Tiny in Rome
11.plot: Tommaso is an Italian furniture designer living in his studio out in the countryside. Admittedly, his five-foot-five stature makes tiny living a perfect fit for him, and his love of all things Roman makes moving to the ancient capital a dream come true.

12.title: From the City to a Tent to a Tiny
12.plot: Ali and Belly have been dating for over 15 years, but after a dream engagement and a wedding on the horizon, they're ready to buy their first home together. They're on the hunt for a simpler, sustainable life and a tiny home with land.

13.title: Theatrical Family Seeking Tiny Sanctuary
13.plot: Alex and Veronica live with Alex's parents, Maggi and Paul, in a converted mill in beautiful Yorkshire. But with this theatrical family, the mill is often loud and crowded, leaving Alex and Veronica wanting an extra tiny space for solace. Can this family all agree on the perfect tiny space or will the curtains close on their tiny dream?

14.title: From Bustling Beijing to Australia Beachfront
14.plot: After living in bustling Beijing for 5 years, Stacey is moving back to her native Australia. Craving a more peaceful life amongst nature, Stacey is determined to find the ultimate beachfront property on beautiful Phillip Island. But with a budget of $275,000 and properties selling at a premium, Stacey realizes that she is going to have to make some tiny sacrifices to make her dream come true.

15.title: Cashing in Good Karma for Tiny Zen
15.plot: Jeremy is a dramatist whose steadfast faith in Buddhism informs his worldview. That's why the new tiny house he hopes to find around Sydney, Australia's beachy suburbs needs to max out the Zen factor with natural materials.

16.title: From California King to Dutch Minimal Living
16.plot: Californian girl Emily is a shoe designer living in Amsterdam with her minimalist European boyfriend Taras. After living in a studio for two years, they're ready to purchase a tiny home of their own.

imdb.title: Tiny House World
plot: Features prospective homeowners looking to find an ideal mini dream home in locations around the world.
